data.title: PICS Appoints Jeff Muto as Vice President of Global Marketing
data.meta_description: PICS Auditing, LLC, the global leader in supply chain alignment solutions, announced today that Jeffrey Muto has joined the company as Vice President of Global Marketing. Mr. Muto will lead global expansion ...
data.text:
IRVINE, CA--(Marketwired - Nov 8, 2013) - PICS Auditing, LLC, the global leader in supply chain alignment solutions, announced today that Jeffrey Muto has joined the company as Vice President of Global Marketing. Mr. Muto will lead global expansion strategy, marketing, and product management, worldwide.

Mr. Muto comes to PICS from Rearden Commerce (now Deem), where he spent four years as Vice President of Marketing & Strategy. Prior to Rearden, Mr. Muto held marketing executive positions at Polyglot Systems and LogicalApps (acquired by Oracle), and global marketing leadership roles with Oracle and Saba Software.

"PICS has built a tremendous business over the past ten years, with sound financials, an incredible customer base, and a sizeable global footprint," said Mr. Muto. "My role is to build upon that foundation -- driving rapid growth within the company's core business, while also leading us into new geographies and markets. We envision the next decade being at least as impressive as the first."

The PICS solution supports clients in 36 countries, and the company operates corporate offices in 12. Clients such as BP, BASF, and hundreds more, depend on PICS to align their supply chains to sustainable business practices, worldwide.

"Jeff adds impressive global marketing and business strategy expertise to our leadership team, coupled with a valuable Silicon Valley pedigree," said John Moreland CEO at PICS. "This is a great hire for our company, and we expect big returns from Jeff's leadership."

PICS is a global contractor management consortium committed to improving Health, Safety and Quality. PICS' prequalification and auditing services have become the standard in many industries, including: Chemical, Construction, Energy, Food & Beverage, Oil & Gas, Mining, Manufacturing, Pulp & Paper and Pharmaceutical. Access to thousands of vendors' prequalification information is housed online at www.PICSauditing.com.
